modShortDescription: Here is the working updated Action Skills mod. It is fully functional and this 7 Days to Die mod adds skill categories for LBD (tools, weapons, etc.)
modDescription:
With permission from Deceptive Pastry here is the working updated Action Skills mod. It is fully functional and this 7 Days to Die mod adds skill categories for LBD ([tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/), [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/), etc.) JaxTeller718 will be expanding this further so as of now it is just a basic edition that increases stats incrementally as you use your item. Updated to Include Fist Weapons, Turrets.

[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/DeceptiveJax_ActionSkills)

If you appreciate JaxTeller718’s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8098-jaxteller718-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [JaxTeller718](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jaxteller718/)
